Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory359.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'The thing... Mister asked me to reveal to you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: '"Loki" has already done so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: "But, from the look of it, you don't seem to be worthy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: "So, let's end it here.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The lights on Voodoo's mask begin to flash and change colors. Roland clenches his weapons."}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'If... you... can... surive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'I... will... judge... again...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Heehee... Heehahaahaa... Hahahahaha!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Voodoo's calm voice becomes twisted, changing into a horrifying scream once again."}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: "Worst case, I'll just tear you apart and throw your remains to Mister! He won't care! Weaklings don't deserve to live!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After a round of battle, Roland is already getting used to her bipolar characteristics.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Worst case? Are you suggesting that... I can still live to see your "Mister"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Dammit... What the... Did those words trigger the defense mechanism...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: '"Loki" has gone haywire, exceeding the prediction. The components of the simulation constraint in her vital fluid need to be readjusted...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: '...But the mission must go on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Individual "Roland", my mission is to test you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: "But I'm not seeing anything worth noting in your performance. Your battle stats are lower than the benchmarks set by Mister.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Neither have you displayed the intelligence—like Mister said—that could neglect the difference in strength.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "...You've done a lot of homework.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo', 3: 'Mister knows everything.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Starting from her hand, Voodoo's entire body begins to tremble. The light spots on her keep changing colors."}
{2: 'Voodoo', 3: '"Lo"... You... betrayer...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: '...So what?! Are you going to... execute yourself? Do you still think you can separate yourself from me... ever since you put your favorite movie character in your brain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: '"Voodoo", no... Researcher RIKD-042... You don\'t seem to understand our relationship, do you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Tsk... You can argue all the time you want, but can I go?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Voodoo is not responding, but the missile launcher on her back locks onto Roland again.'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: '...WHAT DO YOU THINK?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'What shall I take? Your entire body, or a hand, or your head? Which one will make Mister happier?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: "...After a few rounds of engagement, Roland appears to be at a disadvantage. His weapons are no match against Voodoo's air supremacy.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Time after time, Voodoo uses her wings and missiles to outmatch Roland's chain blade."}
{3: 'Roland seems to be cornered. He can only swing his chain blade to repulse another attack from Voodoo.'}
{3: "But once he gets enough distance to fire, he immediately shoots the last eight slugs at Voodoo's helmet."}
{3: "Voodoo's head flinches backward. She tumbles in mid-air, until the auto-balancing device in her suit controls the engine to adjust her position."}
{3: '—She barely manages to maintain balance before falling to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'So painful... It hurts...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Heehahaha... Hahahahaha!! **** you! It hurts so bad!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: "You hit me! I'm going to kill you! I'm going to tear you apart! I'm going to rip your insides out and rub them on your face!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In contrast, Roland makes a firm landing. He pretends to pat dust off himself, even though there is no dust on him. His opponent is blocked by the trees.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Oh, c'mon... You spent all these efforts to lure me here just to beat me up?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He sounds relaxed, but soon taunts again.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'We could have sat down and chatted if you had any complaints. Resorting to violence is not how a gentleman like me would have preferred...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He continues to humiliate his opponent... which is no longer needed. Voodoo has already risen to the sky and dives again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Voodoo?', 3: "Enough with your bullshit! I've no idea what the mission is! I just want you dead!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'With those words come even more ferocious attacks. Obscured from vision, Roland is dashing back, unable to counter.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: "For one split second, Voodoo thought she saw a grin in Roland's eyes. But it disappeared so soon that she felt it was just an illusion."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Tsk, doesn't even care about the mission now? Why would they send a psychopath...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Voodoo has no time to investigate Roland's smile—in fact, she is consumed by Loki's endless fury and has no time to consider."}
{3: "Voodoo's leg slams into Roland with extra strength generated by her wings and thruster."}
{3: 'Knocked back by a strike, Roland collapses to the ground, waving his hand and coughing. Vital fluid drips down from the corner of his mouth.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "C'mon, at least tell me why you want me dead.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The conflict has inevitably attracted someone else's attention. At this moment, Roland's plan is finally complete."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Did your boss not say anything?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Or... cough... are you just a mercenary, hired to take my life?', 4: '1'}
{3: "She pauses a little after hearing Roland's words."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(Is it working?)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It only buys him a little time before something else takes off from the forest.'}
{3: 'It flies over the forest, cliff and Roland, hovering, releasing blistering heat from its exhaust air.'}
{3: 'On the other side, No. 21 struggles to tighten her body as her instincts tell her danger is close.'}
{3: 'The trees are blown apart by the hot air, revealing a white object between them—'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'This scent... this scent?! What a scent!', 4: '1'}

{3: 'The storm howls. Small rocks fall from the cliff as the metal beast spreads her bladed wings, pulling up rocks and fallen leaves around her, adorned with the moon as a crown. She baths in the blood-red moonlight, her shadow stretching infinitely, and she looks like a claw extended right out of the moon.'}
{3: 'The next moment, she suddenly bursts into a twisted growl. Her body twitches, arching into an unnatural curve, and you are baffled by what is happening.'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Chirp-chirp, chirp-chirp, chirp-chirp-chirp...', 4: '1'}
{3: "A low, rustling sound comes out of the monstrosity's throat, getting louder and louder."}
{3: 'No, not rustling... laughing. She is laughing from excitement!'}
{3: 'An excitement... to kill!'}
{3: 'She chirps and laughs, her monotonic and extended voice sending a chill down your spine like the scream of babies abandoned in the sewer.'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Chirp-chirp... hahahahAHAHAHAHAHA!!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her voice suddenly turns into a continuous, high-pitched shriek, filled with equal parts terror and delight. Only a tormented soul in hell could have made such an inhuman sound.'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: "I'm here—here! I'M HERE!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: 'Mister must be so disappointed! He picked such a useless scrub!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Voodoo?', 3: "But... if Voodoo brings him his new toys alive—he'll be happy! Mister will be so happy!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What is that thing mumbling about...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Fall back! We are the targets!', 4: '3'}
